dict.acceptation: 访问者；参观者；游客；候鸟；

sent.orig: The Japanese visitor visitor was confused by another expression used by American business people.
sent.trans: 这个日本游客还被另一个美国商人常用的短语困扰。

sent.orig: A foreign visitor went to Visitor Service Center.
sent.trans: 情景模拟一位外国游客来到参观者服务点。

sent.orig: An annoyed visitor is a lost visitor.
Rebecca, you have a visitor-a male visitor.
sent.trans: 丽贝卡，你有来访者，一个男的。

sent.orig: There are some visitor centers in the park, and we rest in Wenshui Visitor Center.
sent.trans: 公园里也有一些游客中心，我们停在汶水游客中心休息一下。
